name: Mango Lassi
description: A refreshing yogurt-based mango drink, blended with milk, sugar, and a touch of cardamom.
steps: Blend mangoes with yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom until smooth.
Chill in the refrigerator for at least one hour.
Serve cold garnished with a sprinkle of cardamom powder or mint leaves.
tips: Use ripe, sweet mangoes for the best flavor.
Adjust the sugar according to the sweetness of the mangoes.
For a vegan version, use plant-based yogurt and milk.
